name: Mental Health Services
description: Mental Health at Rafiki provides a range of therapeutic services including: - Counseling - Referrals to specialized services - Group Therapy - Support Circles Rafiki’s mental health services acknowledge the generational traumas that have impacted the bodies, psyches, and mobility of the Black community and center these experiences to provide culturally informed care through interdisciplinary modalities of therapy and counseling. We focus on exposing the community to potential healing and wellnes
